title: What is a "conventional" mid lane Lissandra build?
body:
I've always built DFG-Boots-Morellos-Zhonya's-DCap-Void.

I've been told this isn't really a conventional build and now that DFG is being removed, I'm wondering, what IS the normal Liss build?

Edit: I don't ALWAYS build in that order btw, it changes from time to time :D

Actually guys now you're all here, what's a conventional TOP lane Lissandra build?

Top lane lissandra depends on the match up and the team comp. If you are against another tank (and your team is lacking one) people tend to build off tanky 
{{item:3027}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3157}} - also works against top lane assassins. 
Atlernatively, top lane Liss is built the same as mid lane Liss.
